description.english: Stage 02: Break all green boxes before breaking any red box
Stage 04: Break all blue boxes before breaking any red box
Stage 06: Break all red boxes before breaking any green box
Stage 14: Break 10 columns of boxes at left and middle
Stage 15: Break all orange boxes with a flipped-ball
Stage 17: Break all cyan boxes with a flipped-ball
Stage 18: Break all red boxes with a non-flipped-ball
Stage 18: Break all green boxes with a flipped-ball
Stage 19: Reach the Area-R and escape
Stage 20: Reach target in one life
Stage 21: Hands off flight - Release direction key in a flash at halfway and finally arrive
Stage 22: Clear with atmost 4 times color change
Stage 24: Reach the Area-A and escape
Stage 27: Clear all green boxes first
Stage 29: Try a new way of death
Stage 31: Reach the Area-A and escape
Stage 33: Break all boxes with a non-flipped-ball
Stage 35: Break all boxes with a non-flipped-ball
Stage 39: Break all boxes with a flipped-ball
Stage 40: Clear with atmost 4 times color change
Stage 41: Clear in one life and don't ever flip
Stage 42: Clear with atmost 4 times color change
Stage 44: Clear in one life and don't ever flip
Stage 46: Break all blue boxes before turning green
Stage 48: Reach regions A, B, C, D in turn with a blue ball then leave
Stage 51: Reflected by slope atmost 3 times and in one life
Stage 53: Break all green boxes before breaking any cyan box
Stage 54: Break all boxes with a flipped-ball
Stage 55: Reflected by slope only once
